person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On tour , Australia have won all four tests against Italy , Scotland , Ireland and Wales , and scored 414 points at an average of almost 35 points a game .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Australia |
| Italy |
| Scotland |
| Ireland |
| Wales |

Explanation:

* "Australia" is mentioned as having won all four tests, so it is a person entity.
* "Italy", "Scotland", "Ireland", and "Wales" are each mentioned as having played against Australia in one of the tests, so they are also person entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Australia |
| Italy |
| Scotland |
| Ireland |
| Wales |

Explanation:

* "Australia" is mentioned as having won all four tests, so it is a person entity.
* "Italy", "Scotland", "Ireland", and "Wales" are each mentioned as having played against Australia in one of the tests, so they are also person entities.
* "414 points" and "almost 35 points a game" are not person entities, so they have been removed.
